recommended_degree: Administrasi Bisnis, Administrasi, Akuntansi Manajemen, Manajemen, Manajemen Administrasi (Sarjana)
job_description:
Responsibilities:
- Assist the Sales team in handling administrative tasks to support daily operations.
- Prepare and process budget requests, purchase requests, reimbursement forms, and other administrative documents.
- Help maintain and update sales data, reports, and internal tracking sheets.
- Support the creation of quotations, product information sheets, and simple sales documents.
- Coordinate with internal departments (Finance, Operations, Marketing) to ensure smooth approval and document flow.
- Assist in managing customer databases, filing systems, and document archiving.
- Support the team in scheduling meetings, preparing agendas, and taking minutes when needed.
- Monitor the status of ongoing requests and follow up with the relevant departments.
- Provide general administrative assistance to the Sales team and complete ad hoc tasks as required.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field.
- Detail-oriented and comfortable working with administrative tasks and documentation.
- Proficient in Microsoft Excel, Word, able to do pivot, hlookip, vlookup, and teams
- Strong communication and proficient in canva & Capcut is plus
- Able to multitask, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines.
- Responsible, proactive, and eager to learn about sales operations and administrative workflows.
- Basic understanding of sales processes is a plus (but not required).
